articles.author: Debora MacKenzie
articles.title: Why coronavirus superspreaders may mean we avoid a deadly pandemic
articles.description: The covid-19 virus may mostly be transmitted by superspreaders, which means it might be easier to contain the outbreak and prevent it going pandemic
articles.content:
By Debora MacKenzie
Medical imaging is being used to work out how the coronavirus affects the body
Feng Dapeng/Xinhua News Agency/PA Images
For yet another week, covid-19, the disease caused by the new coronavirus, has remained poised just short of becomin… [+381 chars]
